title: ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates and Avant Garde
content:
Can someone please explian how these typefaces are supposed to be used together.  
I have ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates and ITC Avant Garde Gothic and yet they are different sizes and weights (and look fantastically ugly).

Any pointers?

Thanks

Mike.
author: mik

comments.content: From where did you license the fonts? Sounds like they probably came from different foundries.

ITC Avant Garde Gothic Std - from Adobe  
ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates - Fontshop

I do have older versions of ITC Avant Garde Gothic but alas the same problem.

Does anyone know which versions do work together.

Thanks

FontShop carries [Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=avant%20garde) from three vendors. Pictured (welcome back Typophile image upload!) are all three versions of "Avant Garde Gothic Book" rendered at 40pt. Note that the E+F and ITC versions are identical in size, weight and spacing, whereas the Monotype version differs quite a bit. At bottom is the [Avant Garde Gothic Alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=EF.101895.0.0) by Scangraphic (now owned by E+F). It matches the E+F and ITC versions perfectly.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Avant%20Garde%20Gothic%20Alt%20-%20SG.png)

Thank you - all fixed.  
Right one more question - any good resourcers that shed any light onto the correct usage etc.

Cheers all.

I collected a few examples of its use in the [FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/2005/03/avant_garde_got.cfm#5 "Avant Garde Alt in use") and Jürgen Siebert posted a bunch in [his blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703/http:/www.fontblog.de/C420185419/E124238157/index.html).
thank you Stephen - you have been a great help.
More at (a blog appropriately named for this topic) [Slanted](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821015703/http:/www.slanted.de/573).

Awesome thread. Awesome font.

Newbie question:

I'm ready to make a couple avant purchases here, and am just wondering what you all think about TTF vs Postscript on these. (were they converted from postscript to TTF or vice verse, etc)...

Even more newbie question:  
I see that there is a postscript PC and a postscript MAC for sale...shouldn't a PC postscript work fine on a Mac?

Any help greatly appreciated. I've been doing variations of these letters by hand in Illustrator for too long.

Hopefully this can be re opened to help me. I just purchased the alternates for my wife/partner and we can't figure out how they work because of what mik was dealing with originally. We own ITC Avant Garde which I have owned for over ten years. Not only can't I figure out exactly how they work but they are as mik said "different sizes and weights"  
I would love some direction.

Thanks
